Texts.SelectCountry: (pl)Please select Your country to determine if our e-commerce experiennce is avaialble for you at this time.
Texts.AccountAssociatedGeneral: Rejestracja użytkownika powiązanego z istniejącym kontem Motorola Solution.
Texts.AccountAssociatedException: W przeciwnym wypadku, w celu założenia nowego konta, proszę wypełnić poniższy formularz.
Texts.SendmktSaleNotify: Send me information about new Motorola Solutions products and services, deals or recommendations.
Texts.SendOrdersNotify: Send me an email notification about my orders (Including shipment, cancel and update notifications).
Texts.DoNotSendmktSaleNotify: Do NOT send me marketing information by mail. Check this button to stop receiving all MSI marketing information by email (except transactional mailings, subscription mailings about programs in which you are enrolled)
Texts.DoNotSendOrdersNotify: Do NOT send me any order email notifications.
Texts.IWouldLikeToReceiveUpdatesProductNewsAnd: I would like to receive updates, product news and promotional materials for Motorola Solutions.
Texts.AccountNumberAssociation: Przypisz mnie do istniejącego numeru konta
Texts.ConfirmationSentTo: E-mail z potwierdzeniem wysłany na adres
Texts.PleaseActivateEmailAndConfirm48h: Sprawdź skrzynkę i kliknij w link potwierdzający w przeciągu 48h, aby aktywować konto
Texts.ThankYouForVerifyingYourEmail: (pl)Thank you for verifying your email address. You now have general access to product information, and you can make purchases at the Accessory Store.
Texts.SorryThisContentIsNotAvailable: Przepraszamy ten link nie jest obecnie dostępny
Texts.YouHaveRequestedToBeAssociatedToChannelP: Poprosiłeś o połączenie z istniejącym kontem Channel Partner.
Texts.YouMayLoginWithLimitedAccess: Możesz się zalogować do konta z ograniczonym dostępem. Powiadomiliśmy administratora Twojej firmy, aby dokończył tworzenie konta.
Texts.PopoverPasswordRules:
(pl)Password is case sensitive.
Password must be at least 8 characters.
Password must not contain spaces or tabs.
Password must contain three out of below 4 characteristics:
- At least one upper case character [A-Z]
- At least one lower case character [a-z]
- At least one number [0-9]
- At least one of the following symbols: !@#$%^&*(){}:”|<>?
Texts.PopoverAccountNumber:
(pl)An account number is 10 digit that typically starts with a 1.
To find your account number, please contact your
Administrator or a Motorola Sales Representative.
Polish version
Texts.YourEmailIsAlreadyConfirmed: (pl)Your email address has already been verified
Texts.ThanksForDoubleCheckingYourEmail: (pl)Thanks for double-checking, your email is already activated in our system. Click the button below to
Texts.WeCantFindYourEmail: (pl)We can't find your email in our system
Texts.YourRegistrationIsInCompletePleaseClickT: (pl)Your registration is incomplete. Please click the button below to input your information and continue activating your account.
Texts.SomethingWentWrongPleaseClickTheButton: (pl)Something went wrong. Please click the button below to
Texts.WhoopsItsBeenOver48HoursPleaseClickTheBu: (pl)Whoops! It's been over 48 hours. Please click the button below to
Texts.RegistrationUnavailable: (pl)At this time registration is unavailable in this area; however, if you submit your email adress below, we will contact you as soon as access becomes available. Thank you again for your business.
Texts.ThankYouForSavingEmailNonUS: (pl)Thank you for submitting your email address.
Texts.RegistrationAvailabilityNotification: (pl)We will contact you when access is available in your country.
Texts.MobilePhoneCarrierInfo: (pl)Additional fees may apply per your carrier. Please contact your carrier for more information.
Texts.NoteRecentOrders: (pl)Note: Recent orders may not be shown on this list

Validation.SaveChanges: Do you want to save changes?(Y/N)
Validation.CancelChanges: Do you really want to discard changes?(Y/N)
Validation.TheLengthMustBeBetweenMinAndMaxCharacter: Pole powinno zawierać najmniej {{ minLength }} oraz maksymalnie {{ maxLength }} liter
Validation.PasswordMustMeetXCharacteristics: (pl)Password must meet {{ minRules }} out of 4 characteristics: one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one digit, and one of these symbols: ~!@#$%^&*()-_+={}[]|:;"'<>,.?/
Validation.YourNameMustConsistOnlyOf: (pl)Your name must consist only of letters, white spaces, and listed special characters: -._
Validation.PhoneNumberMayContainSpacesAndSymbols: (pl)Phone number may contain spaces and listed symbols: -.()[]
Validation.YouMustAgreeToTermsAndConditions: (pl)You must agree to the Terms and Conditions
Validation.YourEmailAlreadyExistsInOurSystem: (pl)Your email/user ID already exists in our system. Please
Validation.YourAnswerMustConsistOf: (pl)Your answer must consist of letters, numbers and listed symbols: -.()[]/

SecurityQuestions.1: Jakie jest drugie imię Twojego ojca?
SecurityQuestions.2: Jaka była marka Twojego pierwszego samochodu?

SecurityQuestions.7: Jaki jest Twój wymarzony cel podróży?
SecurityQuestions.8: Jak nazywa się miasto, w którym się urodziłeś?

Industry.2: Straż pożarna oraz awaryjne służby medyczne
